name: Choo Choo Math Train
description:
Choo Choo Math Train is a college proyect for Programming I - Universidad Nacional del Litoral. 

It was written in C++ with SFML 2.5, to show how linked list and sort algorithm work.

The goal of the game is to drive the train safely to the final station with the maximum number of wagons.

To gain new wagons, you have to solve simple sum operations. You have a few seconds to solve the sum correctly, otherwise, the wagon will explode !
